channel.title: [317] Finding sprites
channel.description:
I have seen a client like Blood4scape with Dragon sprites but im wonderin ...
where CAn I have those sprites becuse i want to add the m to my client
thanks IN Advance ! :D

item.title: [317] Finding sprites
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Are you talking about models? Like weapons and armor, if so it should be in the models folder, it might be hidden so try un-hide it.

If you’re talking about sprites like the chat box background, administrator crown, prayer icons, it should be in a folder called sprites, sometimes it’s called spirts because some idiot probably stuffed up

All client questions belong in the Client Help section by the way.

Read full topic
